name: Grabbity
description:
NOTE: Currently in pre-alpha state - lots of stuff is missing and things are pretty broken!

Grabbity is a local-multiplayer game for 2-4 players. You will need controllers to play (only tested with XBox 360 controllers so far but others might work).

Controls (XBox 360)
- Left stick to move
- Right stick to aim
- Right trigger to grab/throw/use stuff
- Left trigger to drop grabbed object
- A to jump
- X to sprint
- B to melee
- Left shoulder button to fire hover jets
- Right shoulder button to dash
